title: Elizabeth Holmes’s Office Romance Now on Display in Court
sub_head: The relationship between Theranos’s founder and her top deputy left a trail of text messages that are playing an important role in her criminal fraud trial
body:
The text message popped up on Elizabeth Holmes’s phone in July 2015 from her top deputy at Theranos Inc., Ramesh “Sunny” Balwani.
“I am sad at where you and I are,” Mr. Balwani wrote, adding in another message: “U need me.”
